name: Turbo Snail Squad Games Act 2 - The Garden Takeover Game
name_original: Turbo Snail Squad Games Act 2 - The Garden Takeover Game
description:
Race your way through the gardens in part 2 of the Turbo Snail Squad. The bugs have taken over the garden and you must defeat them! Gather veggies and power ups as you try to take control of your gardens. Unlock new snails and a new garden.
Game only available on Apple Devises.
